title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? - The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: The current behavior is that the output is "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected behavior is that the output should be "MySomeClass". This behavior is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 spec. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set up a ServletContainerInitializer in an environment compliant with Servlet 3.0 spec.
2. Call the onStartup method with a Set of Class<?>.
